resources.string: Alfred has released a new version on Google Play Store. Update to enjoy the latest features and get the bugs fixed right now.
Please make sure your Camera device has enough battery. (7009)
Alfred requires access to your camera. (4002)
Failed to sign in. Please install a browser app on your device to continue with sign in.
Unable to open the page without a web browser.

This schedule will only work on weekdays.
Please do not set up the same turn on/off time.
Do you want to save your changes?
This Camera is offline. The settings cannot be saved.
To activate this feature, please allow Notifications for Alfred in your system setting on %s.
This Camera does not support Person Only mode. You can try it on other Cameras.
This Camera will record videos and notify you when it detects motion.
This Camera will record videos and notify you when it detects a person.
To continue, please go to your Camera device and tap \"Switch to Camera 2.0\" in the settings.
As not to miss any movement, Alfred will switch back to \"All Motions\" mode either when\n1. It is dark\n2. Low-Light Filter is on

You can also watch the live feed on your computer! Check out Alfred WebViewer at https://alfred.computer
If you only have one device in hand, don\'t forget you can also watch the live feed on your computer. Go check out Alfred WebViewer.
Dim the screen of your Camera device after 3 minutes of inactivity.
Do not press the Home/Power key as it may shut down the Camera and WiFi. Tap \"Power-Saving\" to dim and lock the screen.
This Camera has been disabled from another Viewer device.
This Camera has been disabled. Only the owner can enable the Camera.
Failed to save videos. Please allow the storage (photos, files and media) permission for AlfredCamera in Settings.
You can only download up to 10 videos at a time.
The shared video link will be valid until %s.\n\nTo deactivate the link, please delete the video from your Event Book.
The shared video link will be valid for up to 14 days.\n\nTo deactivate the link, please delete the video from your Event Book.
To deactivate the link, please delete the video from Moments.
With Alfred Premium, you can save multiple videos at the same time!
Failed to launch Two-Way Talk. Please allow the microphone permission for AlfredCamera in Settings.
End of Support for Viewer Mode on Android 6 and iOS 14

The device running Android 6, iOS 14, or earlier no longer supports Viewer mode. However, you can continue to use it as a Camera. You can also watch the live feed on your computer at https://alfred.computer
This device does not support Viewer mode.
Zoom is only available for Premium users. Upgrade now!
Double tap on the area you want to zoom in/out
Upgrade to watch live feeds and event videos in HD.
Manual recording is disabled because an automatic recording is in progress.
You are about to activate Siren on your remote Camera.\n\nBy doing this, your Camera will start wailing at the maximum volume until you turn it off by tapping the button again.
Adding a light source will make the Low-Light Filter work more smoothly. Lightsabers would help, too!
Are you sure you want to sign out? Your camera settings will be reset.
Share this Camera with others by adding their email accounts to Trust Circle.
By signing up, you agree to the <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
Please turn on Motion Detection to capture Events.
Videos triggered by Activity Detection will be saved for %s days in Event Book.
Activity Detection is only available when this Camera is online.

No internet connection. Please check your network status. (7008)
We cannot find your payment record.
The installed app is incomplete or corrupted. Please reinstall AlfredCamera from Google Play or via the button below.
Camera 2.0 provides the latest Camera features and improved user experience on newer versions of Android devices.
This Camera device will be switching to Camera 2.0
If you are experiencing issues, you can always switch back to Camera 1.0 from Camera settings.
You are now on the Camera 2.0
Some features are not supported on Camera 1.0. Click on OK to restart the app and apply settings.

Keep Alfred running on your screen and do not press the Home or Power button.

Your report will help us improve Alfred. Meanwhile, here are some tips for you to improve your Live experience:
Connect to another network (e.g. cellular network)
Re-sign in and make sure both your Viewer and Camera are under the SAME account
8~30 characters. Blank spaces are not allowed.
Only emails with letters, numbers, period, \"_\", or \"-\" are accepted.
A verification email has been sent to %s. Please check your mailbox to verify the account before you sign in.
Please check your mailbox to verify the account before you sign in.
Verification emails can only be resent 3 times a day. Please try again in 24 hours.
Wrong email or password. Please try again.
You have failed to sign into this account 10 times today. Please try again in 24 hours.
We\'ll email you a link to reset your password.
You can only reset password three times a day. Please try again in 24 hours.
Password reset link has been sent
The password reset link has been sent to %s. Please check your mailbox to reset your password and sign in again.
This account has already been verified. Please tap \"Sign in.\"
To continue, please go to the Camera device, update the app, and tap Switch to Camera 2.0 in the Camera settings.
To continue, please go to the Camera device and update the app.
Please go to the Camera device, tap on settings, and tap on Switch to Camera 2.0 to adjust the resolution.
Resolution change is not supported on this Camera device.
The camera lens of this device does not support HD video streaming.
Higher resolution is only available for Premium users. Kindly advise the camera owner to consider upgrading for a higher-quality experience.
Make sure Activity Detection works properly by placing your Camera device close to the objects of interest (1-2 m).
Avoid pointing your Camera device towards reflecting surfaces (e.g. windows, mirrors).
Avoid pointing your Camera device towards slightly moving objects (e.g. electric fans, moving trees).
Pair up by logging in on the device you prepared
Log in to Alfred with the same account on the device you prepared (mobile phone, tablet, or computer).
Or pair up by QR code
Scan to pair up with another phone/tablet
This code will expire in %02d min %02d sec.
This QR code has expired. Please tap “Refresh” below to get a new one.
Failed to generate a QR code. Please check your network status and retry.
Scan to Link to Viewer Device
This QR code has expired. Please try again by regenerating a new QR code.
This QR code is invalid. Please scan the QR code displayed on your Viewer device.
To link to Viewer, you’ll exit the current camera first. Tap \"Continue\" to pair with a Viewer using the QR code scanner.
This device is already connected to an account. Please sign out first if you want to connect to another account.
Point this Camera at where you want to monitor.
Install Alfred on another device. Select it as Viewer. Sign in with the SAME email account.
Your current resolution setting is low. Please go to your Camera device and change the resolution to Default.
Device time does not match the current time. Please update this device to automatic system time and try again. (5001)
Please wait while we retrieve your live feed
Camera 2.0 does not support Android versions under 5.0.
Camera 2.0 is not supported on this device.
Notice something moving? Zoom in to check and easily view any detail.
Zoom is not supported on this Camera device. Tap \"LEARN MORE\" to learn why.
Double tap or pinch with two fingers to zoom. The maximum zoom level is 4.0x.
Pinch to zoom is not supported on this Camera device. You can double tap on the area you want to zoom in/out or tap \"LEARN MORE\" to find out how to pinch to zoom.
Please update your Camera device to the latest app version to use pinch to zoom.
Please update your Camera device to the latest app version and update to Camera 2.0 to use pinch to zoom.
Double tap or pinch with two fingers to zoom.
This Camera device is linked to a free account. Please ask the owner to upgrade to Premium to zoom.
Use this device as a Viewer to watch live sessions and videos. For your account security, switching to Viewer mode will sign you out. Tap \"Continue\" to sign in again.
Switching this device to Viewer mode will reset it and erase all account data. To proceed, tap \"Continue\".
Use this device as a Camera to film and monitor.
Scan QR Code to set this device as the camera
How to scan a QR code?
Use another device to scan this QR code or sign in with the same account.
No internet connection. Please check your network status. (7004)
This account was created via Google sign-in. Do you want to sign in with Google instead?
Email account not found. Please contact Alfred for help.
It seems that you’ve already upgraded to Premium with another account. Please log in with that account to access your premium benefits. (6008)
You can turn on \"Stay Zoomed-in\" in Settings to keep the camera zoomed in.
Update Alfred to the latest version on all devices
Connect your Camera to another network
Your detection zone will be automatically reset after the change is applied.
Only motion that happens inside the zone will be detected.
Define a specific area to monitor motion that happens inside. Avoid trees or busy streets with passing cars to reduce the number of false alerts.
Detection zone won\'t work outside the zoomed-in area when Stay Zoomed-in is ON.
Please update your Camera device to the latest app version.
What do you use AlfredCamera for?
Based on your preferences, we will recommend features and updates that best suit your needs.
Are you sure you want to sign out?

We detected that your DNS has been configured to an unidentified address. For your information security, please change your DNS back to default settings and relaunch the app.
For better recommendations, \nwhat scenario best describes your situation?

To prevent unexpected disconnections, please go to the camera device and try the following tips:
Make sure your device is being charged and connected to the internet stably.
Camera app version is up to date

To use Camera Health Check, please update the app to the latest version on your Camera device.

The camera is offline. Please connect it and try again.
The status is not available. Please upgrade the app to the latest version on your Camera.

Camera is running in the foreground
Failed to record events. Please update AlfredCamera on your camera device to fix it.
Why isn\'t Activity Detection recording events?

Hey, I saved huge bucks by turning my old phones into security cameras with Activity Detection. Check it out!\nAndroid: https://link.alfredcamera.app/store/appmenu_tellfriends_android\niOS: https://link.alfredcamera.app/store/appmenu_tellfriends_ios

Videos recorded after the Premium plan expiration time will be saved for %d day(s).
Enter the verification code sent to %s. This code will expire in 30 minutes.
If you forget your PIN code in the future, we will send a verification code to this email. For your security, we recommend that you use a different email rather than your account email.
PIN code and confirm PIN code do not match.

You’re about to exit App Lock setup process and no change will be saved.

This Camera has been signed out by another device.

If you have any account security concerns, learn more about how you can manage your account in our FAQ.
To proceed, please tap continue and sign in again.
To continue, please verify your identity first.
Choose a strong password and don\'t reuse it for other accounts.
Changing your password will not sign you out on your devices. If you have notice any unfamiliar activities, tap \"Continue\" and go to \"Device Management\" to remove any suspicious devices.
Creating a new password will not sign you out on your devices. If you have notice any unfamiliar activities, tap \"Continue\" and go to \"Device Management\" to remove any suspicious devices.
Record non-stop and save footage to your device
Delete all recorded footage from your device

Continuous Recording has been disabled. You are still able to watch the existing footage.
All your recorded footage will be deleted and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
Record continuously and rewatch recorded footage. Tap below to get started.
Pinch or spread to zoom in or out of the timeline to find the specific time.
Tap here to collapse the timeline
Footage is saved to your device which requires free space. To disable this feature or delete existing footage, tap here.
Continuous Recording isn’t enabled. Would you like to turn it on?
Please turn on Continuous Recording to capture everything. You can rewatch your recorded footage at any time.
Continuous Recording is only available when the camera is online. (7006)
Setting up the camera takes up to 1 minute
No footage was recorded at this time

Something went wrong. The recorded footage is no longer available.
Video paused. Would you like to continue watching?
Please check your network status and try again. (7001)
Tap here to review any time in your past footage
Continuous Recording runs in a loop. New footage overwrites recorded footage starting from the oldest.
Permission(s) needed to keep AlfredCamera working properly
To record videos and watch Live feeds remotely
To record sound along with your videos
Want to record videos and watch Live feeds? Please allow AlfredCamera to access your camera.
Want to record sound along with your videos? Please allow AlfredCamera to access your microphone.
Permission for Appear on top is needed
Want to improve your camera stability? Please allow AlfredCamera to display on top of other apps.
To record videos on this device and watch Live feeds on the other one, grant AlfredCamera access to your camera in Settings.
To improve the camera stability, grant AlfredCamera access to display over other apps in Settings.
To pair your other device with the QR Code
Want to pair your other device by scanning the QR Code? Please allow AlfredCamera to access your camera.
To scan the QR Code and pair your other device, grant AlfredCamera access to your camera in Settings.
To save videos to your album
Permission for Storage (photos, files and media) was denied
Want to save videos to your album? Please allow AlfredCamera to access your photos and media on this device.
Location permission to scan Wi-Fi networks was denied
Nearby Wi-Fi networks can reveal your location, so Android requires us asking for your location information to look for nearby networks. Otherwise, you’ll need to manually enter your Wi-Fi network.
Two-way talk to whom near your camera
Want to talk to whom near your camera in real-time? Please allow AlfredCamera to access your microphone.
Turn on the microphone on your camera device
No sound on your Live feeds now. Go to your camera device and turn on your microphone.
Turn on the remote wake-up (appear on top) permission on your camera device
Want to wake up the disconnected camera? Go to your camera device and grant AlfredCamera access to display on top of other apps.
Turn on the camera permission on your camera device
To have AlfredCamera fully functioned as a security camera, please go to your camera device and grant us the camera permission.
To get sound on Live feeds, please allow AlfredCamera to access your microphone in Settings.
Unable to log in via Continue with Google
This device does not support Google Play Services. Please try \"Continue with Email\" or \"Scan to Link to Viewer device\" instead.
This schedule will be running based on the system time of your camera device.
You don’t have any cameras yet.

Download the Alfred app on another Android/iOS device
Open Alfred’s WebCamera on your browser
See the moving objects more clearly in your live feed.
Your camera will temporarily stop and turn offline. The rebooting may take up to 1 minute.

Unplugging during the update may cause damage.
%s will temporarily be offline while updating
Relaunch the app, and try again. If the issue persists, please contact Alfred Support.
Please try again after you manually eject the SD card and reboot your camera.
An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
It may take a few minutes to complete the process. Your camera (%s) will be temporarily disabled and then reboot itself once the update is complete.
Your device firmware is now up-to-date.
Set up the Alfred-made hardware camera
Plug in the device and wait for the green light starts blinking slowly.\n\nDue to batch variations, some devices may not include the \"Ready to pair\" voice command.
I See the Green Light Blinking
Not Seeing the Green Light Blinking?
Insert a pen or other sharp object into the pinhole next to the SD card slot, and press for 5 seconds until you hear a “beep”.
We need to use your location in order to find nearby Wi-Fi networks during setup.
To find nearby Wi-Fi networks, grant AlfredCamera access to your device\'s location in Settings.
Connect your Camera to a 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network.
Connect your Camera to the Wi-Fi network.
To enable Wi-Fi scanning, please turn on your Wi-Fi.
Get ready to scan and pair
Keep a distance of 6-12 inches (15-30 cm) between the two devices (Ruler in Quick Start Guide)
Pair your device in an environment with soft or indirect lighting
Scan the QR code from different angles to capture the best, glare-free image
Use your Camera to scan the QR code
Please refer to the guidance to troubleshoot any issues you may be encountering:
Error 301: Incorrect Wi-Fi type or Wi-Fi name\nPlease choose a 2.4GHz Wi-Fi or enter the correct Wi-Fi name
Error 301: Incorrect Wi-Fi type or Wi-Fi name\nPlease connect to a supported Wi-Fi type (5GHz for AC202 only) and ensure the Wi-Fi name is correct.
Error 302: Unable to access Wi-Fi\nCheck if there are any settings blocking Alfred, such as the firewall or MAC address filters
Error 303: Incorrect Wi-Fi password\nCheck if you enter the correct Wi-Fi password
Error 304: Unstable Wi-Fi signal\nPlease bring your camera closer to the router for a better connection
Error 305: QR code expired\nMake sure to scan the QR code within 10 minutes
Error 301: Incorrect Wi-Fi type or Wi-Fi name
You have successfully added an AlfredCam. Let’s try it out.
Want to automatically record motion videos?
Turn on Activity Detection to start recording whenever your camera detects movement.
You can now get instant notifications when the camera detects motions.
You can enable Detections in Camera Settings later
To start recording motion videos, just turn on Activity Detection whenever you\'re ready.
This Camera needs to be updated.
This Wi-Fi network may not be secured because it is not password protected. We recommend connecting to a different network.
Are you sure you want to leave this page now? You may need to reconnect the camera and start all over again.
This feature is only supported on device with camera 2.0. Tap Learn More to learn how to set it up on your Camera device.
Failed to enable Continuous Recording. An SD card error occurred.
No SD card is detected on your AlfredCam.
You need to Insert an SD card to enable Continuous Recording. We will record continuously and save the recorded footage on your SD card.
Note: New footage will overwrite recorded footage starting from the oldest when the SD card is full.
An unexpected error occurred. Failed to enable Continuous Recording. Please format your SD card or replace it with a new one.
Formatting will erase all data on this SD card. Are you sure you want to continue?
Your SD card is successfully formatted.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Your SD card will be safely removed. Please note that Continuous Recording will be disabled until you insert an SD card again.
You can now remove your SD card. Continuous Recording will be disabled.

Congratulations! Your videos will be recorded with timestamps overlayed.

While we support up to 3 simultaneous viewers, certain device models may impose limitations.
The below camera devices in your account may not support this feature:
To receive notifications that keeps you updated on every event and never miss a moment.
Want to stay informed with real-time updates? Please allow AlfredCamera to access your camera.
To receive notifications that keeps you updated on every event.
Detect activities happening within the frame
Receive alerts when someone lingers for a specified time.
Receive alerts when there are no person activities for the set timeframe.
Receive alerts when motion stops for the set duration.
Set the preferred duration so you can get notified when someone lingers too long in your frame.
Set a specific period so you can get notified at the end if no motions are detected within the timeframe.
Set a timer so you can get notified after the set duration when a motion stops in your frame.
Choose the AlfredCam model you would like to pair.
To identify your model, turn the device over
Plug in the device and wait until you see the green light blinking slowly.\n\nWhen placing your device outdoors, consider sheltered areas for extended camera lifespan.
Playback is only available for Premium users. Kindly advise the camera owner to consider upgrading for a Playback.
Upgrade to access a variety of detection toolkits
Person, Sound, Pet, and Vehicle Detections help you identify the movement of these specific targets. Upgrade to efficiently manage your Events.
Firmware version is up to date
This product has successfully undergone IP65 waterproof testing. Nevertheless, we recommend installing it under a roof overhang or in a sheltered location to extend the product’s lifespan.
Camera Health is not supported on WebCamera yet.
Camera Health is not supported on this firmware version. Please upgrade to the latest version.

Clear up the internal storage now to enable Activity Detection.
Ensure your Camera device has more than 400MB of internal storage to enable Continuous Recording.
You\'ve unlocked extra Cloud Storage with Premium
All the recordings made after your upgrade will be uploaded to our cloud for 14-day retention.
Subscription expired. Events will be stored locally on the Camera device now.
Recorded Event videos will be kept in the Event Book for up to %s days, and may be rotated early depending on the storage available on your Camera device.
Event is only available when the Camera is online. (7006)
Activity Detection has been disabled due to low storage on the Camera device. Please free up some space now to enable detection recording.
Continuous Recording has been disabled due to low storage on the Camera device. Please free up some space now.
Event storage is transitioning to your device starting from March 19, 2024. Or you can keep your footage secured and available at anytime with our Premium cloud service.
As of March 19, 2024, Events are now stored locally on your Camera device.
Event is currently inaccessible. Please try again later.(7015)
Event is currently inaccessible. Please try again later.

No Events available due to no recorded Events or storage limitations. Upgrade now to extend your storage time limit.
